text: ya 'ayuha alnabiu 'iidha ja'ak alnisa' almuminat biallah warasulih yeahdnk ealaa 'alaa yjeln mae allah shrykana fi ebadth, wala yasriqn shyyana, wala yznyn, wala yaqtuln 'awladahuna baed alwiladat 'aw qblha, wala yulhqn bazwajhn awladana laysuu mnhm, wala ykhalfnk fi maeruf tamrhn bh, feahdhn ealaa dhlk, watlb lahuna almaghfirat min allh.
